publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1914 Roseanna Cunningham: Voting Irregularities in the US Presidential Elections—That the Parliament notes with concern the reports of voting irregularities already emanating from the US presidential elections and offers the expertise of Members of the Scottish Parliament in an observer role to ensure that the United States of America is able to conduct a full and fair democratic election. Supported by: Eleanor Scott*, Rob Gibson*

S2M-1914 Roseanna Cunningham: Voting Irregularities in the US Presidential Elections—That the Parliament notes with concern the reports of voting irregularities already emanating from the US presidential elections and offers the expertise of Members of the Scottish Parliament in an observer role to ensure that the United States of America is able to conduct a full and fair democratic election. Supported by: Eleanor Scott, Rob Gibson
S2M-1914 Voting Irregularities in the US Presidential Elections (lodged on 28 October 2004) Michael Matheson*
